front.title: Recommended security controls for federal information systems and organizations

author.organization: National Institute of Standards and Technology (U.S.).

front.abstract: This publication revises NIST SP 800-53 Revision 1 by adding specific guidance on the application of security controls to Industrial Control Systems (ICS). That ICS-specific guidance is contained in Appendix I, and addresses the following: Tailoring guidance; Security control enhancements; Supplements to the security control baselines; and Supplemental guidance.
